price: 67. Waxayna odhan: Rabbigayow! Waxaan adeecnay madaxdayadii iyo odayaashayadii39, oo naga lumiyeen Jidka (Toosan ee Islaamka).
arabic: وَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّآ أَطَعۡنَا سَادَتَنَا وَكُبَرَآءَنَا فَأَضَلُّونَا ٱلسَّبِيلَا۠
footnotes: 39. Waxaa sidoo kale lagu fasiray: “Kuweenna noogu weyn ee madaxda noo ah (culimadeenna) iyo amiirradeenna”.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqālū rabbanā innā aṭaʿnā sādatanā wakubarāanā fa-aḍallūnā al-sabīlā
